name: @progress/jsdo
description: The JSDO is a JavaScript implementation of the CDO Specification published by Progress Software Corporation. The JSDO is a free and open-source full-featured implementation that can be used in web, mobile web and hybrid mobile apps.

scripts.build:jsdo: mkdirp build && concat -o build/progress.jsdo.js src/progress.util.js src/progress.js src/progress.session.js src/auth/progress.auth.js src/auth/progress.auth.basic.js src/auth/progress.auth.form.js src/auth/progress.auth.sso.js
scripts.test:tc-smokes: npm run build:jsdo && mocha test/smoke*.js --recursive --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter

author: Progress Software
